p: Caspases activation was evaluated using Caspase-Glo ® kits (Promega, USA), according to the manufacturer’s protocol. Briefly, MCF7 cells were seeded into 96-well white plate and treated with HMWp (at IC 50 value) for 12 h, 24 h, 48 h and 72 h. After treatment, Caspase-Glo ® reagent was added in 1:1 ratio into each well and incubated at room temperature for 1 h. The luminescent signal was measured using monochromator microplate reader, Tecan ® Infinite M1000 Pro (Tecan Austria GmbH).
